section.name: Release Notes
section.p: The purpose of this section is to provide a description of a Product Service release including any impact that the new or modified capabilities will have on the Discipline Nodes or the PDS user community. An itemized list of changes for each release can be found on the Release Changes page.

section.name: Release 0.1.0
section.p: This release of the Product Service is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date. This initial release of the service is based on the 0.3 release of the Apace OODT CAS Product Server.
